keyMoments.title: Jigoro's Debut
keyMoments.description: Jigoro appears as a mysterious swordsman among the General Zombies, immediately catching attention with fighting movements that resemble Zoro's style.
keyMoments.significance: First appearance of a zombie animated by Zoro's stolen shadow, demonstrating the threat of Moria's powers.

keyMoments.title: Demonstrates Zoro's Techniques
keyMoments.description: Jigoro uses Sanjuroku Pound Ho, Zoro's signature Three Sword Style technique, confirming he possesses Zoro's shadow and abilities.
keyMoments.significance: Proves that shadows transfer complete combat abilities and some personality traits to zombies.

keyMoments.title: Legend of Jigoro of the Wind
keyMoments.description: Revealed to have been a legendary swordsman who killed 7,000 pirates in his previous life to protect his family.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the dangerous combination of a legendary warrior's body animated by a powerful current fighter's shadow.

statusHistory.reason: Died at age 59 before the main story
Reanimated as General Zombie #850 with Zoro's shadow

abilities.abilityName: Three Sword Style: Sanjuroku Pound Ho
abilities.description: A Three Sword Style technique creating three air slashes from three swords, inherited from Zoro's shadow.

abilities.abilityName: Three Sword Style: Hyakuhachi Pound Ho
abilities.description: A One Sword Style technique creating a powerful air slash, inherited from Zoro's shadow.
As a zombie, Jigoro possesses enhanced durability and feels no pain, making him difficult to defeat with conventional attacks.

relationships.description: Jigoro is animated by Zoro's stolen shadow, giving him all of Zoro's combat abilities and some personality traits.

evolutionMoments.description: Jigoro debuts using Zoro's fighting techniques, revealing he has Zoro's shadow.

relationships.description: Jigoro serves Moria as one of his General Zombies, following orders to defeat the Straw Hat Pirates.

reveals.information: Jigoro was a legendary swordsman known as 'Jigoro of the Wind' from West Blue
Killed 7,000 pirates to protect his family during his lifetime
Possesses Roronoa Zoro's shadow and all his sword techniques

keyMoments.title: Tararan's Debut
keyMoments.description: Tararan appears as a massive spider-monkey hybrid zombie, blocking Robin and Franky's path to rescue Luffy.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces the Commander of the Spider Mice and establishes another powerful General Zombie threat.
keyMoments.quote: Monkey, Monkey! You're not going anywhere!

keyMoments.title: Confronts Robin and Franky
keyMoments.description: Tararan engages Robin and Franky in battle, demonstrating his spider web abilities and massive physical strength.
keyMoments.significance: Forces Robin and Franky into a separate battle, further dividing the Straw Hats.

statusHistory.reason: Died before the main story, body preserved on Thriller Bark
Reanimated as a General Zombie by Gecko Moria

affiliations.role: General Zombie and Spider Mice Commander

abilities.description: Tararan can create sticky spider webs from his palms, which he uses to trap and immobilize opponents or create platforms.
As a monkey-spider hybrid, Tararan possesses both simian agility and arachnid abilities, including web creation and climbing.
As a General Zombie, Tararan has enhanced durability and feels no pain, making him extremely difficult to defeat.

relationships.description: Tararan serves Moria as a General Zombie and Commander of the Spider Mice forces on Thriller Bark.

reveals.information: Commander of the Spider Mice on Thriller Bark
Can create sticky spider webs from his palms for combat and mobility

keyMoments.title: Faces General Zombies
keyMoments.description: Luffy is lured into a trap and battles an army of powerful General Zombies alongside Robin and Franky.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Luffy encountering enemies that are significantly more durable than regular zombies.

keyMoments.title: Captured by General Zombies
keyMoments.description: Despite his strength, Luffy is overwhelmed and trapped in a sealed coffin, then carried away to another part of the mansion.
keyMoments.significance: A rare moment showing Luffy captured and separated from his crew, increasing the stakes.

keyMoments.title: Battles General Zombies
keyMoments.description: Robin fights alongside Luffy and Franky against the armored General Zombies in Hogback's mansion.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Robin's combat abilities against powerful zombie opponents.

keyMoments.title: Confronts Tararan
keyMoments.description: Robin teams up with Franky to battle Tararan after the spider-monkey zombie blocks their path to rescue Luffy.
keyMoments.significance: Forces Robin into a battle against a General Zombie while separated from Luffy.

keyMoments.title: Discovers General Zombie Durability
keyMoments.description: Franky fights the General Zombies and discovers they are far more durable than regular zombies, with his usual attacks having limited effect.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the power level difference between regular zombies and General Zombies.

keyMoments.title: Teams Up Against Tararan
keyMoments.description: Franky works with Robin to battle Tararan when the massive zombie blocks their rescue attempt.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Franky's teamwork with Robin and his adaptability in combat.
